channel.title: Altirra update feed (release channel)
channel.description: Automatic update notifications for release versions of the Altirra emulator.

ul.li: Updated to Altirra BASIC 1.58 and AltirraOS 3.33.
Fixed a crash in FLAC decoder and added workaround for D3D11 crash in Intel graphics driver.
Fixed handling of raw FSK blocks in .CAS images.
Improved compatibility of 850 R: handler bootstrap.
Improved timing of XF551 high speed disk operation.
Fixed LOADEXE.XEX on the Additions disk.
Fixed atfs:// paths accessing the wrong files on a DOS 2 image.
